content.text: I think we need a thing to be able to "follow" a git-ssb repo, or a git-ssb user, and then automatically replicate whatever they push. The same would be really useful for [p2p music](%VStrS5HvTPcYfcx9zdGbiN9Q3/NUGgWBMtDDLm1X+/o=.sha256) as well as maybe [#dat](#dat) [#ipfs](#ipfs) [#beaker](#beaker)!
